articles.title: A conversation with Kevin Hassett
articles.description: The transcript of a conversation with the chairman of the Council of Economic Advisers
articles.content: Dr Kevin Hassett, Chairman of the Council of Economic Advisers, spoke to The Economist on November 14th. What follows is a lightly edited transcript. The Economist: Were here in central London a stones throw from the House of Commons. And were with Dr Kevin H… [+22193 chars]
